title: Duy Giang's Artworks
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:basalt 
themesetting=a|
darkmode=a]]


[[module CSS]]
:root {
     --header-title: "SCP FOUNDATION";
     --header-subtitle: "SECURE - COINTAIN - PROTECT";
     --header-font: 'Poppins'
}
[[/module]]




[[div class="notation"]]
[[=]]
[[module Rate]]
Hi, welcome to my artworks's page! I'm [[*user duy giang]], 
I have been making plenty of artworks about SCP contents, so I decided to post them here. 
I hope you enjoy them.
[[collapsible show="Some familiar places" hide="Close"]]
All my socials can be accessed via my Linktree:
[https://linktr.ee/duygiang1207/ Linktree]
Individual places:

[*https://www.deviantart.com/duygiang1207 DevianArt]
[*http://scp-vn.wikidot.com/duy-giang SCP-VN Artpage]
[*https://duygiang1207.tumblr.com// Tumblr] [Not active]


[[/collapsible]]
[[/=]]

[[/div]]
